repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: The mansucript of Vaiyākaraṇasiddhāntakaumudī contains the part till the Lakārārthaprakriyā of the Tiṅgantaprakriyā. Brown thick wooden guard folio. Corners of the guard folio are turned black and right margin has some white spots. Looks like worm eggs. Front guard folio 24 written in left margin in pencil. 87 is written in the middle in pink chalk. First blank folio with wormholes and has some lines carved in Granth script. hariḥ oṃ in the left margin and first line is śrirāmarāma (a few letters illegible.) On verso of 2nd blank folio is written in the left margin hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu viṣṇupurāṇaṃ and a line in granth script is written tatvena yadvidavidiśvara, on verso of 3rd blank folio has 6 lines written and the first line resembles with the line on the previous folio. tatvena yadvidavidiśvara. On 1r the 4 lines are written (1r 1) vākyakāraṃ vararuciṃ bhāṣyakāraṃ patañjaliṃ pāṇiniṃ sūtrakārañca praṇatosmi munitrayaṃ (1r 2) yenākṣarasamāmnāyamadhigamyamaheśvarāt kṛtsnaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ proktaṃ tasmai pāṇinaye namaḥ (1r 3) oṃ pāṇinikātyāyanapatañjalibhyaśabdavidyāsaṃpradāyakartavye mahat (2 letters illegible) matyaḥ? (1r 4) aiuṇ ṛl̥k eauṅ. Few marginal additions or corrections are seen.

msItem.title: Vaiyākaraṇasiddhāntakaumudī (Tiṅgantaprakriyānta)
msItem.author: Bhaṭṭoji Dikṣita
msItem.rubric: (1v 1) hariḥ oṃ ௳ munitrayaṃ namaskṛtya taduktiḥ paribhāvya ca vaiyākaraṇasiddhāntakaumudiyaṃ viracyate .
msItem.incipit: (1v 1) aiuṇ ṛl̥k eoṅ aiauc hayavaraṭ laṇ ñamaṅaṇanam jhabhañ ghaḍhadhaṣ jabagaḍadaś khaphachaṭhathacaṭatav
msItem.explicit: (93r 11) rdivandivaḥ . iti vyākhyātaṃ avaskandanalavanādirūpā bhūtānadyatanaparokṣā ekakartṛkāḥ asvāsthyakriyetyarthvāt . iha punaḥ punacaskandeti bhrama eva . phurimavaskandetyādimadhyamapuruṣai (93r 12) kavacanamityapikeṣāncit bhrama eva puruṣavacane saṃjñe iha netyuktvatvāt evaṃ bhāvakarmaṇosvaviṣaye
msItem.finalRubric: (93r 12) iti lakārārthaprakriyā iti tiṅgantaprakriyā ௳ hariḥ oṃ௳ śubhamastu௳

support.p: Brown thick wooden guard folio. Corners of the guard folio are turned black and right margin has some white spots. Looks like worm eggs.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 8 blank folio, 93 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil Numerals in left margin. Last folio not numbered
supportDesc.condition: Good state of preservation. First blank folio with wormholes and guard folio with some white spots at the corners. Worm eaten in the left upper corner of 1v.

handNote.desc: Very neatly written. Clean and Small hand writing.

additions.desc: On 1v in the left margin is written hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu.
Front guard folio 24 written in left margin in pencil. 87 is written in the middle in pink chalk.

listBibl.bibl:
The Siddhanta Kaumudi of Bhattoji Diksita; edited and translated into English by Srisa Chandra Vasu, Publisher: Allahabad : The Panini Office, 1905-07
Caturveda, Giridharasharma and Parameshvaranandasharma (ed.), Vaiyākaraṇasiddhāntakaumudī with Bālamanoramā and Tattvabodhinī (Reprint)-1995.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text: (1v 1) hariḥ oṃ munitrayaṃ namaskṛtya taduktiḥ paribhāvya ca vaiyākaraṇasiddhāntakaumudiyaṃ viracyate . aiuṇ ṛl̥k eoṅ aiauc hayavaraṭ laṇ ñamaṅaṇanam jhabhañ ghaḍhadhaṣ jabagaḍadaś khaphachaṭhathacaṭatav (1v 2) kapay śaṣasar hal iti māheśvarāṇi sūtrāṇi aṇādisaṃjñārthāni eṣāmantyā itaḥ laṇsūtre akāraśca hakārādiṣvakāraḥ uccāraṇārthaḥ (93r 11) rdivandivaḥ . iti vyākhyātaṃ avaskandanalavanādirūpā bhūtānadyatanaparokṣā ekakartṛkāḥ asvāsthyakriyetyarthvāt . iha punaḥ punacaskandeti bhrama eva . phurimavaskandetyādimadhyamapuruṣai (93r 12) kavacanamityapikeṣāncit bhrama eva puruṣavacane saṃjñe iha netyuktvatvāt evaṃ bhāvakarmaṇosvaviṣaye iti lakārārthaprakriyā iti tiṅgantaprakriyā ௳ hariḥ oṃ ௳ śubhamastu௳
